snippet.title: We Are Football - International Teaser
snippet.description:
The team captain has the ball, sends it to the center and there is their best striker! One-two and… GOOOAAAL!

Become both the head coach and the manager of your dream team in this a new take on football management games from Winning Streak Games and THQ Nordic called We Are Football. Coach women’s and men’s teams in your favourite country and lead them to victory.

Organise the daily training, choose the right tactics to beat your opponents, negotiate the best advertising contracts and much more. Build your own stadium for your growing fanbase and celebrate your wins together with your team.

The decision is yours: start in the highest league or work your way up from a small club and take your players to glory.
---
We Are Football will release for PC on June 10th, 2021.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1196470
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wearefootballgame
#WeAreFootballGame #fmsgefoerdert
